## The Wright Brothers: Taking Flight

The Wright brothers, Orville and Wilbur, are famous for building and flying the first successful airplane in 1903. They invented a new way to control the plane, making it easier to steer. Before their famous flight, they practiced with gliders and built their own wind tunnel to test wing designs. Though others claimed to invent the airplane first, the Wright brothers' achievement is widely recognized.
